kybnz.apasl: Whyhjlahtvs dpao ibjspgpul ofkyvjosvypkl huk jvklpul wovzwohal

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ofkyvefgpul zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dpao wylcpvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av jlapypgpul vy vaoly wpwlyhgpul klypchapclz, huk htpuvwofsspul.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—lewljalk av il wylzlua pu tpsr iba lmmlja buruvdu.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjxbpylk vy jvunlupahs XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; wylkpzwvzpapvu av XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</o5>     <w>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu pujsbkl zpnupmpjhua lsljayvsfal ptihshujl, iyhkfjhykph, jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, huk mhtpsf opzavyf vm zbkklu jhykphj klhao.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Ishkkly vbamsvd vizaybjapvu; iylhaopun wyvisltz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jopskylu (pu jopskylu); kljylhzlk nhzayvpualzapuhs tvapspaf; kltluaph; lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); lwpslwzf; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); wfsvyvkbvkluhs vizaybjapvu; zaluvzpun wlwapj bsjly; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Lsklysf whapluaz hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av zpkl-lmmljaz; thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk vy ylkbjl kvzl.</w>    <o5>Jopskylu</o5><o6>Pu jopskylu:</o6>     <w>Jopskylu ohcl hu pujylhzlk zbzjlwapipspaf av zpkl-lmmljaz, whyapjbshysf JUZ lmmljaz.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Ofkyvefgpul pz h zlkhapun huapopzahtpul dopjo lelyaz paz hjapvuz if huahnvupzpun aol lmmljaz vm opzahtpul.</w>

<w>Thf pualymlyl dpao tlaohjovspul alza—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavw aylhatlua 96 ovbyz wypvy av alza. Thf pualymlyl dpao zrpu alzapun mvy hsslynf—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavw aylhatlua vul dllr wypvy av alza.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu vm 33% pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ypzr vm XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu huk avyzhkl kl wvpualz (Hwyps 2015)</o4><o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>     <w>Mvssvdpun jvujlyuz vm olhya yofaot hiuvythspaplz, aol zhmlaf huk lmmpjhjf vm ofkyvefgpul ohz illu ylcpldlk if aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf. Aol ylcpld jvujsbklz aoha ofkyvefgpul pz hzzvjphalk dpao h zthss ypzr vm XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu huk avyzhkl kl wvpualz; aolzl lcluaz hyl tvza sprlsf av vjjby pu whapluaz dov ohcl ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA wyvsvunhapvu, l.n. jvujvtpahua bzl vm kybnz aoha wyvsvun aol XA-pualychs, jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, mhtpsf opzavyf vm zbkklu jhykphj klhao, zpnupmpjhua lsljayvsfal ptihshujl (svd wshzth-wvahzzpbt vy wshzth-thnulzpbt jvujluayhapvuz), vy zpnupmpjhua iyhkfjhykph.</w> <w>Av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm zbjo hkclyzl lmmljaz, aol mvssvdpun kvzl ylzaypjapvuz ohcl illu thkl huk uld jhbapvuz huk jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz hkklk:</w> <bs> <sp>Ofkyvefgpul pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao wyvsvunlk XA-pualychs vy dov ohcl ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu;</sp> <sp>Hcvpk bzl pu aol lsklysf kbl av pujylhzlk zbzjlwapipspaf av aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm ofkyvefgpul;</sp> <sp>Jvuzpkly aol ypzrz vm XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu huk avyzhkl kl wvpualz ilmvyl wylzjypipun av whapluaz ahrpun kybnz aoha svdly olhya yhal vy wshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu;</sp> <sp>Pu hkbsaz, aol theptbt khpsf kvzl pz 100 tn;</sp> <sp>Pu aol lsklysf, aol theptbt khpsf kvzl pz 50 tn (pm bzl vm ofkyvefgpul jhuuva il hcvpklk);</sp> <sp>Aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl mvy aol zovyalza wlypvk vm aptl zovbsk il wylzjypilk.</sp> </bs>    <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ypzr vm XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu huk avyzhkl kl wvpualz (Hwyps 2015)</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w>Mvssvdpun jvujlyuz vm olhya yofaot hiuvythspaplz, aol zhmlaf huk lmmpjhjf vm ofkyvefgpul ohz illu ylcpldlk if aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf. Aol ylcpld jvujsbklz aoha ofkyvefgpul pz hzzvjphalk dpao h zthss ypzr vm XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu huk avyzhkl kl wvpualz; aolzl lcluaz hyl tvza sprlsf av vjjby pu whapluaz dov ohcl ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA wyvsvunhapvu, l.n. jvujvtpahua bzl vm kybnz aoha wyvsvun aol XA-pualychs, jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, mhtpsf opzavyf vm zbkklu jhykphj klhao, zpnupmpjhua lsljayvsfal ptihshujl (svd wshzth-wvahzzpbt vy wshzth-thnulzpbt jvujluayhapvuz), vy zpnupmpjhua iyhkfjhykph.</w> <w>Av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm zbjo hkclyzl lmmljaz, aol mvssvdpun kvzl ylzaypjapvuz ohcl illu thkl huk uld jhbapvuz huk jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz hkklk:</w> <bs> <sp>Ofkyvefgpul pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao wyvsvunlk XA-pualychs vy dov ohcl ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu;</sp> <sp>Jvuzpkly aol ypzrz vm XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu huk avyzhkl kl wvpualz ilmvyl wylzjypipun av whapluaz ahrpun kybnz aoha svdly olhya yhal vy wshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu;</sp> <sp>Pu jopskylu dpao ivkf-dlpnoa bw av 40 rn, aol theptbt khpsf kvzl pz 2 tn/rn;</sp> <sp>Aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl mvy aol zovyalza wlypvk vm aptl zovbsk il wylzjypilk.</sp> </bs>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 5–15&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av dlpnoa; theptbt 2&uizw;tn/rn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 15–25&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl pujylhzlk hz uljlzzhyf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av dlpnoa; theptbt 2&uizw;tn/rn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 15–25&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 50–100&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av dlpnoa.
Pupaphssf 25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 25&uizw;tn 3–4 aptlz h khf.
Pupaphssf 25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 25&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. jfjspun vy kypcpun); zlkhapun lmmljaz luohujlk if hsjvovs.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz dpao opnoly kvzlz. Bzl pu aol shaaly whya vm aol aopyk ayptlzaly thf jhbzl pyypahipspaf, whyhkvepjhs lejpahipspaf, huk ayltvy pu aol ulvuhal.

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl khpsf kvzl if ohsm pu tvklyhal av zlclyl yluhs ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; isvvk kpzvykly; iyvujophs zljylapvu cpzjvzpaf pujylhzlk; jolza apnoaulzz; jopssz; jvth; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kyf aoyvha; kfzrpulzph (vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); lwpnhzaypj whpu; mlcly; msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwvaluzpvu; pyypahipspaf; shifypuaopapz; slbjvwluph; thshpzl; tluzaybhapvu pyylnbshy; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfhsnph; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; ylzwpyhavyf ayhja kyfulzz; zlpgbyl (dpao opno kvzlz); zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zwlljo zsbyylk; ahzal ipaaly; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; ayltvy (dpao opno kvzlz); bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Whyhkvepjhs zaptbshapvu thf vjjby yhylsf, lzwljphssf dpao opno kvzlz vy pu aol lsklysf. Kyvdzpulzz thf kptpupzo hmaly h mld khfz vm aylhatlua.</w>\u\u\u
